meanings.definition: A decorative trimming or braid used on clothing.
meanings.sent1: The dress was beautifully adorned with golden galloons.
meanings.sent2: She sewed intricate galloons onto the sleeves of the jacket.
meanings.sent3: The galloons on the shirt made it look like a royal garment.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit shimmered with galloons, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The galloons added a touch of elegance to the plain dress.

meanings.definition: A type of ornamental cord or fabric used for embellishment.
meanings.sent1: The curtains were tied back with luxurious galloons.
meanings.sent2: The costume designer chose vibrant galloons for the stage costumes.
meanings.sent3: The galloons on the pillow gave it a regal appearance.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the soft rustle of silk galloons.
meanings.sent5: She carefully selected the perfect galloons to match the upholstery.

meanings.definition: To adorn or decorate with galloons.
meanings.sent1: She decided to galloon her dress for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: The tailor expertly gallooned the edges of the tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: He gallooned the room with streamers for the party.
meanings.sent4: The artist gallooned the painting with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: They gallooned the stage with colorful ribbons for the performance.
